support.description: Content is actively maintained. Please report errors and inconsistencies

author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, without giving up ten things you can’t realize perfection.

segments.pli: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, mānaṃ—
segments.en: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, offensiveness, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, and conceit.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
segments.en: Without giving up these ten things you can’t realize perfection.

segments.pli: Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
segments.en: After giving up ten things you can realize perfection.

segments.pli: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, mānaṃ—
segments.en: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, offensiveness, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, and conceit.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
segments.en: After giving up these ten things you can realize perfection.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, without giving up ten things you can’t realize…

suttaplex.blurb: Ten things must be given up before attaining perfection.
